promoted.headline: Google SERP Photo "Bug" Audit
promoted.text: Google confirmed they had a technical "bug" wherein photos from the Google My Business listings were not showing on the live Google search results page. We have audited all the Google search results pages (for Client and Other Client) to confirm the photos were pulling to the results. We found 6 locations with the issue. We contacted Google, and they were able to make changes on their backend to get this fixed.

promoted.headline: GMB Map Marker Updates
promoted.text: We have been working with Google on all the map marker updates. Google has recently made the process much harder to get some map marker changes to stick. This will most likely be an ongoing project, so feel free to keep forwarding them over as needed.

promoted.headline: GMB Listing Suspension Reinstatement
promoted.text: Google has been public in saying their system has been incorrectly marking listings as "suspended."  We found the listing was suspended for this location, but were able to go through the appeal process with Google, and get the listing quickly reinstated.

promoted.headline: OnPage Audits & Optimizations
promoted.text: Google has been public in saying their system has been incorrectly marking listings as "suspended."  We found the listing was suspended for this location, but were able to go through the appeal process with Google, and get the listing quickly reinstated.

promoted.headline: Google Review Removal
promoted.text: Our request to remove a review for this location was denied by Google. “Assessed review, and found it not in violation of our policies.” “Consider replying to customer directly to resolve the issue.”

promoted.headline: GMB Prior Brand Photos Removal
promoted.text: We are currently working with Google to resolve. Prior 6 images removed, except for one, which is still appearing on SERP. Google incorrectly displaying "Menu" button and not displaying current Client images on SERP.

promoted.headline: GMB Photos not Appearing on SERP
promoted.text: Google has been contacted to resolve.

promoted.headline: GMB Owner Access Rejected
promoted.text: Our request was rejected with note: “Not a contact for this account.
